title: Ne'er Misser
content:
Ne'er Misser Rare 2~7 Damage 1d6 +1 Force Weapon Enchantment +1 Magic MissileLevel 3 Evocation Spell Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: On the stock, the crafter of this crossbow etched in tiny print: 'ifn yer gonna miss, why dontchyae stop being a wally, and hit instead!
